messages.subject: Re: Shinsengumi AIM Chat  2
messages.msgSnippet: The Shinsengumi AIM Chat has a sequel... I mention Cho s girlfriend Ratgirl from Angrybee/Unsafesects Hajime and Tokio ...I added a link to Angrybee s fic
messages.messageBody:
The Shinsengumi AIM Chat has a sequel...
I mention Cho's girlfriend "Ratgirl" from Angrybee/Unsafesects'
"Hajime and Tokio"...I added a link to Angrybee's fic at the top of my
fic.
Shinsengumi AIM CHAT #2 is located in Files>>>Story Archives and you
should find the folder easy.

Shinsengumi AIM CHAT #2 is rated R>>>NC-17 because Harada, Aim id
"Spearman" and his woman are involved in a lucrative but completely
well meaning e-biz...enjoy (^_^)

Besides the TMPD's Public Security Division(PSD)...there is the Public
Morality Patrol...(PMP) or as Nagakura calls it (PIMP)

messages.subject: Shinsengumi AIM Chat
messages.msgSnippet: Title: Shinsengumi AIM Chat Author: secretarytocapt3 E-mail: secretarytocapt3@.*** Source: RK, original (some ideas from
messages.messageBody:
<<uploaded in "files" section>>

Title: Shinsengumi AIM Chat
Author: secretarytocapt3
E-mail: secretarytocapt3@...
Source: RK, original (some ideas from chats with members of SHQ),
MIXED WITH HISTORY ^_^

[Basic idea] takes place after Boshin War,BUT alternative universe
where they have modern technology and none of them are dead ^_^...so
you'll read about Harada, Kondo, and HIjikata...

*its less painful to read if you have been keeping up with the info
posted at SHQ Yahoo Groups or http://www.shinsengumimb.com

[Characters]
InspectorFujita/HotWolf = FujitaGoro/Saitou Hajime
KrazyKio/DemonLoverfromAizu = Fujita Tokio
Shinsengumicapt2 = Nagakura Shinpachi
ArmedArtist=Nakajima Nobori
BuddhistAltars4sale=Shimada Kai
Archived on the website: NO
General Rating: PG-13
Warning: it's just really lame
Disclaimer: I don't own these characters
